revised_title: A New Method of Approximation for Elliptic and Ultra-Elliptic Functions
tldr: The author presents a new method of approximation for evaluating elliptic and ultra-elliptic functions. The method uses geometric means between arithmetic and harmonic means to find approximate values. This method can be applied to integrals of irrational functions and can be used to approximate elliptic functions with a high degree of accuracy.
